alert.note: Alert for Frio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 5:30PM CDT until April 28 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Frio County in south central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bluff, or 11 miles west of Pearsall, moving east at 25 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southwest of Moore, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pearsall, North Pearsall, Moore, Goldfinch, Derby, Divot, Bigfoot, Bluff, Frio Town, Schattel, Three Oaks, U.S. Highway 57 and Interstate 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
